alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 8:29PM CDT until July 14 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LA SALLE AND SOUTHERN DE KALB COUNTIES... At 829 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Somonauk, or near Sandwich, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sandwich, Sheridan, Shabbona, Lake Holiday, Hinckley, Somonauk, Waterman, Serena, Leland, Millington and Norway. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
